1.0.name: wordpress/wp-social-share
1.0.description:
Social Networks are very popular now a days and great source to get readers for your blog. WP Social Share Plugin Helps you and your users to share blog posts directly from your blog to social network sites like facebook, twitter, linkedin etc. This version of WP Social Share plugin supports following social networks

  • Twitter
  • Facebook
  • Google Plus
  • Linkedin
  • Stumbleupon
  • Digg
  • reddit
  • Evernote

You can 1. Enable/disable any of the above social share buttons from admin panel 2. Enable/disable social share buttons for Category/Home and Post pages 3. Enable/disable any social network button for Category/Home and Post Pages.
